this is awesome,didnt know  a tv  serie was made.
i loved the books(22 years ago),and the movie was ok.
but a tv  show would bring out the depth and
give a larger insight(as the books did).

thanx a lot Shirotora.
oh,and ill seed for a long time.

Is there any more of the tv series or did they only do  the pilot?

Johnny J.

Only a pilot episode. The movie was supposed to be a series, and when that flopped, they decided to try to make a TV series, which also flopped. Most people do not understand the humor especially from  Chiun, in the middle of all the action and violence.
Any more episodes from The Graphicaudio series ?
